report.title: Squares Summary.
report.description: A summary of which squares have been allocated and which have had 1 or more surveys carried out so far.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM locations l LEFT JOIN locations_websites lw on lw.location_id=l.id AND lw.deleted=false LEFT JOIN location_attribute_values lavAlloc on lavAlloc.location_id=l.id AND lavAlloc.location_attribute_id=#allocated_square_attr_id# AND lavAlloc.deleted=false LEFT JOIN cache_samples_functional csf on csf.location_id = l.id AND csf.survey_id in (#survey_ids#) WHERE l.location_type_id in (#location_type_ids#) AND #website_filter#

param.name: location_type_ids
param.description: Comma separated list of Location IDs to limit report to.

param.name: survey_ids
param.description: Comma separated list of Survey IDs to limit report to.

column.name: allocated
column.sql: case when lavAlloc.int_value = 1 then 'Yes' else 'No' end

column.name: surveyed
column.sql: case when count(csf.id) > 0 then 'Yes' else 'No' end
